userStories.title: Remote MCP Connection
userStories.description: As a Claude.ai user, I want to connect to the MCP server from Claude.ai so that I can access its tools and resources without running anything locally.
acceptanceCriteria: POST /mcp endpoint accepts MCP JSON-RPC requests
Endpoint supports Streamable HTTP transport (latest MCP spec)
Response streams via text/event-stream content type
Stateless request handling (no session persistence required)

userStories.title: OAuth Authentication for MCP
userStories.description: As a Claude.ai user, I want to authenticate securely via OAuth so that my connection is protected and I control access to my account.
acceptanceCriteria: All /mcp requests require valid OAuth 2.0 Bearer token
Token validation uses existing OAuth implementation
401 Unauthorized returned for missing/invalid tokens
403 Forbidden returned for insufficient scopes

userStories.title: CORS for Claude.ai
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want CORS restricted to Claude.ai so that only authorized clients can connect.
acceptanceCriteria: CORS allows origin https://claude.ai
OPTIONS /mcp preflight requests handled correctly
Allowed headers include Authorization, Content-Type, Accept
CORS configuration is easily extensible for future origins

userStories.title: Basic Error Logging
userStories.description: As a developer, I want basic error logging so that I can diagnose connection issues when they occur.
acceptanceCriteria: Failed requests are logged with timestamp
Logs include error type, request path, and response status
MCP error responses follow specification format

userStories.title: Setup Page MCP Endpoint Display
userStories.description: As a Claude.ai user, I want clear setup instructions so that I can connect to the MCP server without technical difficulty.
acceptanceCriteria: Setup page displays public MCP endpoint URL
URL has copy-to-clipboard functionality
Step-by-step Claude.ai connection instructions provided
OAuth authentication flow walkthrough included
Troubleshooting tips available

userStories.title: Connection Health Indicator
userStories.description: As a Claude.ai user, I want to see my connection status so that I know if my MCP server is properly connected.
acceptanceCriteria: Health check endpoint available (GET /mcp or /health)
Setup page displays connection status indicator
Visual feedback shows if MCP server is reachable

userStories.title: Railway Deployment
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to deploy the HTTP-enabled MCP server to Railway so that it's accessible to Claude.ai users.
acceptanceCriteria: Application deploys successfully on Railway
Railway TLS termination handles HTTPS
MCP endpoint accessible via Railway public URL
End-to-end OAuth + MCP flow works with Claude.ai
